property.name: query
property.value: select instance_id, cast(concat(instance_id, '-', section) as char) section_id, section from ( select distinct hs.instance_id, hs.section from hotspot_sentence hs /* convert disease into id */ inner join i2b2_2008_disease ds on ds.disease = hs.label where ds.disease_id = @export.label@ and evaluation > @export.cutoff@ ) s order by instance_id

property.name: query
property.value: select cast(concat(hs.instance_id, '-', hs.section) as char) section_id, hs.section, ne.anno_base_id, ne.confidence, c.anno_ontology_concept_id, c.code from hotspot_sentence hs /* convert disease into id */ inner join i2b2_2008_disease ds on ds.disease = hs.label /* get named entities */ inner join anno_contain ac on ac.parent_anno_base_id = hs.anno_base_id and ac.child_uima_type_id = 8 inner join anno_named_entity ne on ne.anno_base_id = ac.child_anno_base_id /* get ontology concepts */ inner join ytex.anno_ontology_concept c on c.anno_base_id = ne.anno_base_id where ds.disease_id = @export.label@ and evaluation > @export.cutoff@ order by hs.instance_id, hs.section, ne.anno_base_id

property.name: query
property.value: select cast(concat(hs.instance_id, '-', hs.section) as char) section_id, hs.section, w.anno_base_id, w.canonical_form from hotspot_sentence hs /* convert disease into id */ inner join i2b2_2008_disease ds on ds.disease = hs.label /* get words */ inner join anno_contain ac on ac.parent_anno_base_id = hs.anno_base_id and ac.child_uima_type_id = 25 inner join anno_word_token w on w.anno_base_id = ac.child_anno_base_id and w.canonical_form is not null /* exclude words are not in named entities */ left join anno_contain acw on acw.child_anno_base_id = ac.child_anno_base_id and acw.parent_uima_type_id = 8 where acw.parent_anno_base_id is null and ds.disease_id = @export.label@ and evaluation > @export.cutoff@ and canonical_form not in (select stopword from stopword) order by hs.instance_id, hs.section
